page.description: Open a queue given a connection string
page.prototype: .Open as A5Storage::CallResult (BYREF queue as a5queueing::queue, ConnectionStringIn as C [, Passphrase as C])

argument.name: BYREF queue
argument.description: Returned Queue object, if open was successful.

argument.name: Passphrase
argument.description: Optional secret for handled encrypted Connection Strings.

page.example: dim qm as A5Queueing::Queue = null_value() dim callresult as p = A5Queueing::Queue::Open(qm,"Provider='RabbitMQ';Host='localhost';Queue='TestQ';") if callresult.success then ' call queue methods... else ui_msg_box("Error",callresult.text) end if
